revised_title: Eclipse Expedition to Pineda de la Sierra: Observations and Techniques
tldr: The author describes an expedition to Pineda de la Sierra, Spain, to study the solar eclipse and obtain large-scale images of the flash spectrum. They discuss the selection of the observing station, the instruments used, and the techniques employed to capture the solar spectrum. The expedition aimed to study the eruptive nature of gases in the sun and the corona spectrum.
